segments.content: Written By
FINAL DRAFT June 3, 2008

dialogue.text: FINAL DRAFT June 3, 2008

segments.content: A MYSTERIOUS WARRIOR treks across the rugged landscape.
Legend tells of a legendary warrior
whose Kung Fu skills were the stuff
of legend.
The warrior, his identity hidden beneath his flowing robe and
wide-brimmed hat, gnaws on a staff of bamboo.
He traveled the land in search of
worthy foes.

The warrior sits at a table drinking tea and gnawing on his

          bamboo. The door BLASTS open. The MANCHU GANG rushes in and

          surrounds him.
(to warrior)
I see you like to CHEW!
(beat)
The Boss punches the table.

character.name: Maybe you should chew on my FIST!!

dialogue.text: The Boss punches the table.

segments.content: The warrior said nothing for his
mouth was full. Then, he swallowed.
He swallows.
And then, he spoke.
(dubbed hero voice)
Enough talk. Let's FIGHT!

WHAM! The warrior delivers a punch and the whole gang goes

          flying.
He was so deadly in fact that his
enemies would go blind from
overexposure to pure awesomeness.
The gang members blindly flail about.
ONLOOKERS swoon.
And ATTRACTIVE!
How can we repay you??
There is no charge for awesomeness,
or attractiveness.
ONE HUNDRED ASSASSINS appear and surround the warrior.
The entire bar swells, packed to the rafters with ninjas.

The roof EXPLODES and a cloud of ninjas erupts into the sky.

          Like a tornado, the warrior spins and knocks them all down.
It mattered not how many foes he
faced. They were no match for his
bodacity.
The warrior beats up a thousand ninjas, delivering his final
blow while doing a split between two trees.
The warrior stands amongst a field of vanquished foes as god-
rays shine down upon him.
Never before had a panda been so
feared... and so loved.
Even the most heroic heroes in all
of China, the Furious Five, bowed
in respect to this great master.
We should hang out.

As the Five salute the warrior, he turns to see more bandits approaching. The Five strike an attack pose. The warrior brandishes a shiny green sword and leaps off the mountain into the sea of bandits.

dialogue.text: As the Five salute the warrior, he turns to see more bandits approaching. The Five strike an attack pose. The warrior brandishes a shiny green sword and leaps off the mountain into the sea of bandits.

segments.content: But hanging out would have to wait.
`Cause when you're facing the ten
thousand demons of Demon Mountain,
there's only one thing that
matters. And that's--
In mid air, the Five talk to the warrior in a strange voice.
Po! Get up!
You'll be late for work!
INT. PO'S ROOM - DAY Po lands hard on the floor. He tries to clear his head and wake up.

dialogue.text: INT. PO'S ROOM - DAY Po lands hard on the floor. He tries to clear his head and wake up.

segments.content: We see his room is filled with various kung fu posters (including a poster featuring all of the Five) and souvenirs, and a wooden version of the Sword of Heroes (the green sword). Po SIGHS. He attempts to kick himself to his feet but alas, his belly is too worthy a foe.

dialogue.text: We see his room is filled with various kung fu posters (including a poster featuring all of the Five) and souvenirs, and a wooden version of the Sword of Heroes (the green sword). Po SIGHS. He attempts to kick himself to his feet but alas, his belly is too worthy a foe.

segments.content: Po! What are you doing up there?
Po hops to his feet, imitating his Kung Fu action figures.

dialogue.text: Po hops to his feet, imitating his Kung Fu action figures.

segments.content: Monkey! Mantis! Crane! Viper!
OUTSIDE on the balcony of the neighboring house, a pig watering flowers stares at Po. Po tries to play it cool and then quickly ducks out of sight.

dialogue.text: OUTSIDE on the balcony of the neighboring house, a pig watering flowers stares at Po. Po tries to play it cool and then quickly ducks out of sight.

segments.content: Po! Let's go! You're late for work!

He takes a ninja star from his floor and chucks it at the wall. It bounces off. He throws the star again, but it bounces off again. He picks it up and heads downstairs. He trips and falls the rest of the way. INT. KITCHEN - DAY Po falls flat on his face on the kitchen floor. A panda- shaped shadow looms over Po.

dialogue.text: He takes a ninja star from his floor and chucks it at the wall. It bounces off. He throws the star again, but it bounces off again. He picks it up and heads downstairs. He trips and falls the rest of the way. INT. KITCHEN - DAY Po falls flat on his face on the kitchen floor. A panda- shaped shadow looms over Po.

segments.content: Sorry, Dad.
Reveal that the shadow is actually caused by a basket being carried by a small DUCK. This is PO'S DAD. Po gets to work, which is not easy since the kitchen's not really made for a panda his size.

dialogue.text: Reveal that the shadow is actually caused by a basket being carried by a small DUCK. This is PO'S DAD. Po gets to work, which is not easy since the kitchen's not really made for a panda his size.

segments.content: What were you doing up there? All
that noise.
Oh, nothing. Just had a crazy
dream.
He gets back to work.
About what?
Huh?
The dream. What were you dreaming
about?
What was I... eh, I was dreaming
about uh... heh...
Push in on Po -- is he going to admit his dream? He hides his
throwing star behind his back.
THOK. Dad stops chopping vegetables.

dialogue.text: THOK. Dad stops chopping vegetables.

segments.content: Noodles. You were really dreaming
about noodles?
Uh, yeah. What else would I be
dreaming about?
Po hands a noodle bowl to a customer, then realizes his
throwing star is sitting in it.
(to customer)
Careful, that soup is... sharp!
Oh, happy day! My son, finally
having the noodle dream!
He throws his arms around Po.
You don't know how long I have been
waiting for this moment.
When Dad pulls out of the hug, Po is now wearing a noodle
apron.
This is a sign, Po!
Po looks at the apron nervously -- what has he gotten himself
into?
Uh...a sign of what?
You are almost ready to be
entrusted with the secret
ingredient of my "Secret Ingredient
Soup." And then you will fulfill
your destiny and take over the
restaurant, just as I took it over
from my father, who took it over
from his father, who won it from a
friend in a game of mahjong.
Dad Dad Dad, it was just a dream.
No, it was the dream. We are noodle
folk. Broth runs through our veins.
But Dad, didn't you ever, I dunno,
want to do something else?
Something besides noodles?
Po looks surprised.

dialogue.text: Po looks surprised.

segments.content: Dad gets a wistful look in his eyes.

character.name: When I was young and crazy...

dialogue.text: Dad gets a wistful look in his eyes.

segments.content: I thought about running away and
learning how to make tofu.
So why didn't you?!
Oh, because it was a stupid dream.
Can you imagine, me making tofu?
(laughs at the thought)
No. We all have our place in this
world. Mine is here. And yours is--
I know. Is here.
No, it's at tables two, five,
seven, and twelve.
He loads Po's arms with bowls of soup.

A GONG sounds in the distance. Po looks out the window at the distant JADE PALACE. EXT. JADE PALACE - DAY SLAM ZOOM in towards Palace. End next to palace on an old red panda (SHIFU) playing a FLUTE. He is surrounded by the bushes and trees that nestle between the Palace buildings. Wider: We dolly around from behind the bushes. Stealthy dark shapes move in the foreground. Back on Shifu, still playing. He seems oblivious. Five figures explode from the undergrowth simultaneously, diving on Shifu. Shifu moves like lightning - the flute now wielded like a staff - he deflects, blocks, dodges, parries - the attackers go flying - They roll and pick themselves up, turning to face Shifu, who is now standing - poised - ready for their next move.

dialogue.text: A GONG sounds in the distance. Po looks out the window at the distant JADE PALACE. EXT. JADE PALACE - DAY SLAM ZOOM in towards Palace. End next to palace on an old red panda (SHIFU) playing a FLUTE. He is surrounded by the bushes and trees that nestle between the Palace buildings. Wider: We dolly around from behind the bushes. Stealthy dark shapes move in the foreground. Back on Shifu, still playing. He seems oblivious. Five figures explode from the undergrowth simultaneously, diving on Shifu. Shifu moves like lightning - the flute now wielded like a staff - he deflects, blocks, dodges, parries - the attackers go flying - They roll and pick themselves up, turning to face Shifu, who is now standing - poised - ready for their next move.

segments.content: Well done, students... if you were
trying to disappoint me.
He uses his flute to correct the Five's technique.
Tigress, you need more ferocity.
Each of the Five bows respectfully as their name is mentioned.

dialogue.text: Each of the Five bows respectfully as their name is mentioned.

segments.content: Crane - height. Viper - subtlety.
Shifu suddenly points the flute at a scared PALACE GOOSE.

dialogue.text: Shifu suddenly points the flute at a scared PALACE GOOSE.

segments.content: Master Shifu!
(impatiently)
What?!
(startled)
Aah! It's Master Oogway. He wants
to see you.
Shifu looks up, concerned.

Shifu strides purposefully down the hallway, which is lined

          with palace geese.

Candles, incense, and smoke fill the room. The door bursts

          open, the candles flicker. Shifu enters.
He bows. Then looks up without unbowing.

dialogue.text: He bows. Then looks up without unbowing.

segments.content: Reveal Master Oogway... a wise, old tortoise.

dialogue.text: Reveal Master Oogway... a wise, old tortoise.

segments.content: Why must something be wrong for me
to want to see my old friend?
So... nothing's wrong?
Shifu looks up, concerned. Oogway opens his mouth... and blows out a candle. And another candle. And another.

dialogue.text: Shifu looks up, concerned. Oogway opens his mouth... and blows out a candle. And another candle. And another.

segments.content: Finally, Shifu uses his Kung Fu to blow them all out. Oogway
smiles knowingly.
You were saying?
I have had a vision... Tai Lung
will return.
Shifu looks stricken.

Quick, impressionistic images of Shifu battling a large,

          shadowy figure (Tai Lung).

Shifu is rattled. He looks at the claw marks that still scar

          the wall and quickly looks away. But he regains his

          composure.
That is impossible. He is in
prison.
Shifu makes a split decision.

dialogue.text: Shifu makes a split decision.

segments.content: He comes flying in. Shifu gets in his face.

dialogue.text: He comes flying in. Shifu gets in his face.

segments.content: Fly to Chogun Prison and tell them
to double the guards, double their
weapons. Double everything! Tai
Lung does not leave that prison!
The goose flies off, but... SMACK! He hits a column. Then he is off. Back on Oogway, as he walks toward camera, away from Shifu.

dialogue.text: The goose flies off, but... SMACK! He hits a column. Then he is off. Back on Oogway, as he walks toward camera, away from Shifu.

segments.content: One often meets his destiny on the
road he takes to avoid it.
We have to do something. We can't
just let him march on the valley,
and take his revenge! He'll, he'll--
Oogway looks into the water of the moon pool.
Your mind is like this water, my
friend. When it is agitated, it
becomes difficult to see. But if
you allow it to settle, the answer
becomes clear.
Shifu and Oogway stare into the pool. Oogway settles the
water, revealing the reflection of an intricately carved
dragon clutching a SCROLL in its mouth.
The Dragon Scroll...
It is time.
But who? Who is worthy to be
trusted with the secret to
limitless power? To become...the
Dramatic music as we push in on Oogway's face. Then...

dialogue.text: Dramatic music as we push in on Oogway's face. Then...

segments.content: INT. NOODLE SHOP - DAY Po is serving customers, but has trouble squeezing between tables.

dialogue.text: INT. NOODLE SHOP - DAY Po is serving customers, but has trouble squeezing between tables.

segments.content: Oop...sorry.
Hey! Watch it, Po!
Sorry. Suck it up.
He sucks his belly in, but this causes his butt to interfere
with a bunny family's meal.
Ugh!
A couple palace geese put up a poster on the wall and a palace pig hits a tiny gong. This gets Po's attention. He rushes up to the poster.

dialogue.text: A couple palace geese put up a poster on the wall and a palace pig hits a tiny gong. This gets Po's attention. He rushes up to the poster.

segments.content: What?! Master Oogway's choosing the
Customers jump up excitedly.

dialogue.text: Customers jump up excitedly.

segments.content: Everyone! Everyone! Go! Get to the
Po urges the villagers out the restaurant.

dialogue.text: Po urges the villagers out the restaurant.

segments.content: One of the Five is gonna get the
Customers rush to finish their food.

dialogue.text: Customers rush to finish their food.

segments.content: We've been waiting a thousand years
for this! Just take the bowl!
Other customers are finishing their soup.
One old lady customer slowly counts out coins and puts them
on the table.
This is the greatest day in Kung Fu
history! Don't worry about it, just
go!
He starts to run.
Po stops dead in his tracks, busted.

dialogue.text: Po stops dead in his tracks, busted.

segments.content: To the...Jade Palace?
But you're forgetting your noodle
cart! The whole valley will be
there, and you'll sell noodles to
all of them.
Selling noodles? But Dad, you know,
I was kinda thinking maybe I...
Yeah?
I was kinda thinking maybe I...
Po wants to say something to his dad, but he loses his nerve.

dialogue.text: Po wants to say something to his dad, but he loses his nerve.

segments.content: ...Could also sell the bean buns.
They are about to go bad.
That's my boy! I told you that
dream was a sign!
EXT. VALLEY SQUARE - DAY Throngs of Villagers are streaming into the arena. A couple BUNNY KIDS run by.

character.name: Yeah, ha ha, glad I had it.

dialogue.text: EXT. VALLEY SQUARE - DAY Throngs of Villagers are streaming into the arena. A couple BUNNY KIDS run by.

segments.content: Yippee!
I'm a Kung Fu warrior!

Where's Po? PAN DOWN a long, long, long, long flight of stairs. Po stands at the bottom with his noodle cart, looking up at the daunting task before him. Po struggles to pull his noodle cart up the stairs.

dialogue.text: Where's Po? PAN DOWN a long, long, long, long flight of stairs. Po stands at the bottom with his noodle cart, looking up at the daunting task before him. Po struggles to pull his noodle cart up the stairs.

segments.content: The sun beats down on Po, but he presses forward. Climbing.
Climbing.
Po is still struggling up the stairs.
Come on! Come on, ya-- Almost
there...
He stops, flopping onto his back to catch his breath.
WIDEN TO REVEAL he's only made it up seven steps.
Two Pigs pass by.

dialogue.text: Two Pigs pass by.

segments.content: Sorry, Po.
Po watches as they run up the stairs. His eyes narrow. This is his heroic moment.

character.name: We'll bring you back a souvenir.

dialogue.text: Po watches as they run up the stairs. His eyes narrow. This is his heroic moment.

segments.content: Po tosses off his hat and apron and begins his ascent up the stairs. EXT. JADE PALACE - ARENA PLATFORM Oogway reaches the bottom of the palace stairs and a Palace Pig bangs a gong.

character.name: No. I'll bring me back a souvenir.

dialogue.text: Po tosses off his hat and apron and begins his ascent up the stairs. EXT. JADE PALACE - ARENA PLATFORM Oogway reaches the bottom of the palace stairs and a Palace Pig bangs a gong.

segments.content: It is an historic day, isn't it,
Master Oogway?
Yes, and one I feared I would not
live to see. Are your students
ready?
Yes, Master Oogway.
Now know this, old friend. Whomever
I choose will not only bring peace
to the Valley, but also to you.
As Shifu contemplates what this could mean, Oogway starts
walking off. Shifu quickly joins Oogway as they head towards
the roaring crowd below. The pig bangs the gong.
EXT. VALLEY SQUARE - DAY Throngs of Villagers are streaming into the arena. EXT. TOP OF STAIRS - DAY Po gasps for air as he hoists himself over the last step, laughing victoriously.

dialogue.text: EXT. VALLEY SQUARE - DAY Throngs of Villagers are streaming into the arena. EXT. TOP OF STAIRS - DAY Po gasps for air as he hoists himself over the last step, laughing victoriously.

segments.content: (out of breath)
The doors to the palace arena begin to close.

dialogue.text: The doors to the palace arena begin to close.

segments.content: Po runs to the entrance and proceeds to bang on the door.

character.name: Oh no! No no no! Wait! I'm coming!

dialogue.text: Po runs to the entrance and proceeds to bang on the door.

segments.content: DRUMS inside drown out Po's pounding. He yells.

dialogue.text: DRUMS inside drown out Po's pounding. He yells.

segments.content: Inside, spectators' screams drown out Po's yelling. Po panics for a beat and then finds a window. He jumps and weakly struggles to pull himself up. Po struggles to peek through the window.

dialogue.text: Inside, spectators' screams drown out Po's yelling. Po panics for a beat and then finds a window. He jumps and weakly struggles to pull himself up. Po struggles to peek through the window.

segments.content: Citizens of the Valley of Peace! It
is my great honor to present to
you... Tigress! Viper! Crane!
The Five jump into the middle of the ring.

dialogue.text: The Five jump into the middle of the ring.

segments.content: Po manages a brief glimpse of the Five before a gust of wind knocks Po to the ground and shuts the window.

dialogue.text: Po manages a brief glimpse of the Five before a gust of wind knocks Po to the ground and shuts the window.

segments.content: Po runs over to a crack in the wall.

dialogue.text: Po runs over to a crack in the wall.

segments.content: Peeky-hole!
Inside the arena, Po catches a glimpse of Crane as he spreads his wings.

dialogue.text: Inside the arena, Po catches a glimpse of Crane as he spreads his wings.

segments.content: Yeah! Woo! The Thousand Tongues of
One of the spectators walks in front of Po, cutting off his view.

dialogue.text: One of the spectators walks in front of Po, cutting off his view.

segments.content: Whoa! Look at that.

Po backs up to get a better look at Crane in the sky and accidentally falls down the stairs. Po climbs back up and drops his head -- he missed it. MONTAGE: Po tries karate chopping the door open...to no avail. He slumps to the ground.

character.name: Hey, get out of the way!

dialogue.text: Po backs up to get a better look at Crane in the sky and accidentally falls down the stairs. Po climbs back up and drops his head -- he missed it. MONTAGE: Po tries karate chopping the door open...to no avail. He slumps to the ground.

segments.content: Po attempts a pole vault, but falls on his back. The pole whips around and hits him into the arena wall. Po rigs a catapult, only to get clobbered by it. The crowd CHEERS. Po sits atop the stairs. Alone.

dialogue.text: Po attempts a pole vault, but falls on his back. The pole whips around and hits him into the arena wall. Po rigs a catapult, only to get clobbered by it. The crowd CHEERS. Po sits atop the stairs. Alone.

segments.content: Po snaps to attention. Po pulls on a rope tied to a tree.

dialogue.text: Po snaps to attention. Po pulls on a rope tied to a tree.

segments.content: And believe me citizens, you have
not seen anything yet!
Master Tigress! Face Iron Ox and
his Blades of Death!
Tigress sets up to deliver her move.
Po launches himself up above the fence, gets a peek at
Tigress, then falls out of view just as she does her move.
Po lands outside the arena in a fireworks tent.

Oogway senses something. He raises his hand and the crowd

          hushes.
I sense the Dragon Warrior is among
us.
Shifu motions for the Five to gather in the center of the
ring.
Citizens of the Valley of Peace!
Master Oogway will now choose...
the Dragon Warrior!
Po comes to.
He sees the fireworks and has an idea.

dialogue.text: He sees the fireworks and has an idea.

segments.content: INT. TOURNAMENT RING - DAY Oogway closes his eyes and raises his hand as ceremonial DRUMS start to play. EXT. TOURNAMENT RING - DAY Po struggles with something, his back turned to us. Reveal he has tied a load of fireworks to a chair. He hops on and lights the fuse.

dialogue.text: INT. TOURNAMENT RING - DAY Oogway closes his eyes and raises his hand as ceremonial DRUMS start to play. EXT. TOURNAMENT RING - DAY Po struggles with something, his back turned to us. Reveal he has tied a load of fireworks to a chair. He hops on and lights the fuse.

segments.content: Po's Dad rushes over and tries to blow out the fuse.

dialogue.text: Po's Dad rushes over and tries to blow out the fuse.

segments.content: What are you doing?
What does it look like I'm doing?
Stop! Stop! I'm going to see the
Dragon Warrior!
But I don't understand. You finally
had the noodle dream.
Po looks uneasy.
I lied. I don't dream about
noodles, Dad!
He looks at the fuse... almost all gone... Po holds onto the
chair for dear life, closes his eyes, and braces himself for
liftoff.
I love kung fuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu-
Po finally opens his eyes...
He's still on the ground. The fuse was a dud. Po falls face
first into the dirt. He looks away, embarrassed. Po's Dad
holds out his apron.
Come on, son. Let's get back to
work.
Po sighs, starts to reach for the apron, then-- BOOM! The rockets ignite, propelling Po into the stadium wall.

dialogue.text: Po sighs, starts to reach for the apron, then-- BOOM! The rockets ignite, propelling Po into the stadium wall.

segments.content: Po's rocket chair blasts him into the sky amid a shower of fireworks.

dialogue.text: Po's rocket chair blasts him into the sky amid a shower of fireworks.

segments.content: Po climbs up and up...until the rockets die out and the chair loses power...

dialogue.text: Po climbs up and up...until the rockets die out and the chair loses power...

segments.content: Oogway's arm sweeps down the line of the expectant Five... Po falls towards the center of the ring... The tension builds as the Five wait to see who will be picked. Then... SMASH! Po lands and kicks up a huge dirt cloud, obscuring the ring. INT. ARENA PO POV: He sees the Five looking down at him, appalled. Po comes round slowly, getting his bearings. He looks around and sees Oogway. Strangely, the old turtle is smiling.

dialogue.text: Oogway's arm sweeps down the line of the expectant Five... Po falls towards the center of the ring... The tension builds as the Five wait to see who will be picked. Then... SMASH! Po lands and kicks up a huge dirt cloud, obscuring the ring. INT. ARENA PO POV: He sees the Five looking down at him, appalled. Po comes round slowly, getting his bearings. He looks around and sees Oogway. Strangely, the old turtle is smiling.

segments.content: What's going on? Where...uh? What
are you pointing--?
He looks up. An awful realization starts to dawn. Po GULPS.
He is desperately embarrassed.
Oh. Okay. Sorry. I just wanted to
see who the Dragon Warrior was.
He tries to shuffle his butt out of there, mumbling
apologies.
How interesting.
Master, are you pointing at...me?
Him.
Po tries moving out of the way of Oogway's finger, but it keeps following him.

dialogue.text: Po tries moving out of the way of Oogway's finger, but it keeps following him.

segments.content: You.
Oogway grabs Po's hand and holds it up for all to see.

dialogue.text: Oogway grabs Po's hand and holds it up for all to see.

segments.content: The universe has brought us the
Dragon Warrior!
What?
What??
What???

The pig bangs the gong.

          The crowd goes wild! They cheer! They scream! Confetti falls!

          A palanquin is carried past Shifu.

Po stands there, utterly stunned, his mouth hanging open. He is abruptly lifted up out of shot. Cut to the Palace Geese straining. Po is being lifted with great effort on the palanquin. He is carried off. Shifu elbows his way urgently through the thronging crowd to get to Oogway.

character.name: Stop! Wait! Who told you to--?

dialogue.text: Po stands there, utterly stunned, his mouth hanging open. He is abruptly lifted up out of shot. Cut to the Palace Geese straining. Po is being lifted with great effort on the palanquin. He is carried off. Shifu elbows his way urgently through the thronging crowd to get to Oogway.

segments.content: Master Oogway, wait! That flabby
panda can't possibly be the answer
to... our problem. You were about
to point at Tigress. That thing
fell in front of her. That was just
an accident!

Oogway smiles benignly as we hear an off-screen CRASH! The camera adjusts to reveal the palanquin has collapsed under Po. Shifu looks at Oogway. Oogway just smiles. A squad of burly pigs rushes in and hoists Po, the palanquin, and the Geese onto their shoulders, and they head off for the Jade Palace. Stunned, Shifu watches them go. Behind him, the Five approach and bow.

dialogue.text: Oogway smiles benignly as we hear an off-screen CRASH! The camera adjusts to reveal the palanquin has collapsed under Po. Shifu looks at Oogway. Oogway just smiles. A squad of burly pigs rushes in and hoists Po, the palanquin, and the Geese onto their shoulders, and they head off for the Jade Palace. Stunned, Shifu watches them go. Behind him, the Five approach and bow.

segments.content: Forgive us, Master. We have failed
you.
Shifu spins around.
No. If the panda has not quit by
morning, then I will have failed
you.
Confetti flutters through the air as the celebration
continues around them.

A huge prison is carved into the side of a frozen mountain.

          Fifteen stories of iron and rock. No windows. One door --

          locked, bolted and sealed tight. Rhinoceros guards in armor

          patrol the perimeter.

          Zeng, the palace goose, flies into frame and a Rhino Sentry

          spots him in the distance. He lands, sliding on the ice and

          crashing into the gate. The rhinos point their spears at him.
Wait wait wait! I bring a message
from Master Shifu.
CLANG! The doors creak open. The terrified goose peers in.
What?!?!
(reading)
"Double the guard?! Extra
precautions?! Your prison may not
be adequate!"
The Goose is quaking in fear. Stern Rhinos surround him,
staring daggers at him. The Commander snaps the scroll shut.
You doubt my prison's security?
Absolutely not.
(then)
Shifu does. I'm just the messenger.
I'll give you a message for your
ON A BRIDGE

dialogue.text: ON A BRIDGE

segments.content: Escape from Chogun Prison is
impossible!
The Goose is awed by the cavernous prison.
The goose looks over the bridge's edge. The prison goes down a long ways. The commander hits the goose on the back.

dialogue.text: The goose looks over the bridge's edge. The prison goes down a long ways. The commander hits the goose on the back.

segments.content: A feather from the goose drifts down the prison.

dialogue.text: A feather from the goose drifts down the prison.

segments.content: Yes, very impressive. It's VERY
impressive.
One way in, one way out, one
thousand guards, and one prisoner.
Yes, except that prisoner is Tai
AT THE ELEVATOR

dialogue.text: AT THE ELEVATOR

segments.content: Several guard rhinos winch the goose and the commander down. The commander grabs the chain and shakes the elevator, trying to scare the goose.

dialogue.text: Several guard rhinos winch the goose and the commander down. The commander grabs the chain and shakes the elevator, trying to scare the goose.

segments.content: The commander just laughs. The elevator finally lands, sending an echo throughout the prison. AT DOORS - A number of doors unlock, one after the other. Finally, a drawbridge is lowered out onto an island.

which someone has overlaid a drawing of a panda.)
(re: diagram)
Quick cuts to Monkey meditating in his room and Crane doing calligraphy in his. Po's yelps distract them.

dialogue.text: Quick cuts to Monkey meditating in his room and Crane doing calligraphy in his. Po's yelps distract them.

segments.content: Ow! Don't...
(laughing)
Stop it, stop-- Yow! I know Master
Shifu's trying to inspire me and
all, but if I didn't know any
better, I'd say he was trying to
get rid of me.
Po chuckles. The others look at each other and chuckle
awkwardly.
I know he can seem kind of
heartless--
He violently jabs another needle in Po.
But, ya know, he wasn't always like
that.
According to legend, there was once
a time when Master Shifu actually
used to smile.
No.
Cut to Tigress out in the hallway. She can hear them talking.

dialogue.text: Cut to Tigress out in the hallway. She can hear them talking.

segments.content: But that was before...
Before what?
Tigress enters.
Crane's shadow is silhouetted on the wall.

dialogue.text: Crane's shadow is silhouetted on the wall.

segments.content: Uh yeah, we're not really supposed
to talk about him.
Well, if he's going to stay here,
he should know.
(trying to ease the
tension)
Tigress turns to Po.

character.name: Guys, guys. I know about Tai Lung.

dialogue.text: Tigress turns to Po.

segments.content: He was a student, the first ever to
master the thousand...
Tigress approaches Po and leans in towards him.
(nervously trailing off)
...scrolls of... kung fu... and...
then he turned bad... and now he's
in jail.
Tigress shakes her head at the panda's ignorance.
He wasn't just a student.

FLASHBACK. Shifu peeks out of the Training Hall and finds a

          baby leopard cub on the steps.
Shifu found him as a cub. And he
raised him as a son.
Baby Tai Lung pulls on Shifu's whiskers.
...and when the boy showed talent
in Kung Fu...
Baby Tai Lung punches the training dummy across the floor.
...Shifu trained him.
Shifu teaches Baby Tai Lung how to punch.
He believed in him. He told him he
was destined for greatness.
Hard cut to a full-grown Tai Lung demolishing a training
dummy.
It was never enough for Tai Lung.
He wanted the Dragon Scroll. But
Oogway saw darkness in his heart
and refused. Outraged, Tai Lung
laid waste to the valley. He tried
to take the scroll by force. And
Shifu had to destroy what he had
created.
Tai Lung ransacks a village on his way up to the Jade Palace.
He crashes through the doors, running towards a waiting Shifu
and Oogway.
Shifu leaps at Tai Lung to deliver a kick.

Seeing only baby Tai Lung running towards him, Shifu pulls his kick short. Tai Lung counters with a devastating strike and Shifu crashes to the ground holding his broken leg. Tai Lung leaps for the scroll, but Oogway stops him with strikes at his pressure points. He falls to the ground in a heap.

dialogue.text: Seeing only baby Tai Lung running towards him, Shifu pulls his kick short. Tai Lung counters with a devastating strike and Shifu crashes to the ground holding his broken leg. Tai Lung leaps for the scroll, but Oogway stops him with strikes at his pressure points. He falls to the ground in a heap.

segments.content: Shifu loved Tai Lung like he'd
never loved anyone before...
Young Tigress in the training hall strikes the dummy in the
same manner as Tai Lung. Shifu corrects her form. Nothing
more. Young Tigress looks crestfallen.
...or since.
The sad, young Tigress cross-dissolves to adult Tigress.
Everyone is quiet in the moment.
And now he has a chance to make
things right, to train the true
Dragon Warrior. And he's stuck with
you: a big, fat panda who treats it
like a joke.
Po makes a googly-eyed face.
Doieeeee...
(charging at Po)
Mantis pops up and halts Tigress.

dialogue.text: Mantis pops up and halts Tigress.

segments.content: Wait! My fault! I accidentally
tweaked his facial nerve.
Po falls face first to the floor, revealing his back is
covered with needles.
And may have also stopped his
heart.
Shifu is sitting in meditation, fidgeting incessantly.
Inner peace. Inner peace. Inner
peace.
He finally opens one eye.
Would whoever is making that
flapping sound, quiet down!
Satisfied with the silence, Shifu nods and resumes his
meditation.
BOOM. Zeng drops in from the ceiling.

dialogue.text: BOOM. Zeng drops in from the ceiling.

segments.content: Oh, Zeng. Excellent. I could use
some good news right now.
Uh...

Oogway stands under the peach tree, deep in thought. Shifu

          rushes in, emerging from the mist, extremely agitated.
Master! Master!
Hmmm?
(out of breath)
I have-- it's-- it's very bad news.
Ah, Shifu. There is just news.
There is no good or bad.
Master, your vision...your vision
was right. Tai Lung has broken out
of prison. He's on his way!
He turns to face Shifu and stares at him, eyebrow raised.

dialogue.text: He turns to face Shifu and stares at him, eyebrow raised.

segments.content: ...If you do not believe that the
Dragon Warrior can stop him.
The panda? Master, that panda is
not the Dragon Warrior.
He wasn't even meant to be here --
it was an accident!
There are no accidents.
Yes, I know. You've said that
already. Twice.
Well, that was no accident either.
Thrice.
My old friend, the panda will never
fulfill his destiny, nor you yours,
until you let go of the illusion of
control.
Illusion?
Yeah. Look at this tree, Shifu. I
cannot make it blossom when it
suits me, nor make it bear fruit
before its time.
But there are things we can
control.
Shifu kicks the tree and a peach falls to his feet.
I can control when the fruit will
fall.
A peach falls on his head and Oogway chuckles. Shifu tosses
the peach in the air, leaps up, and splits it with a chop.
Shifu punches the ground, creating a hole and places the seed in it.

dialogue.text: Shifu punches the ground, creating a hole and places the seed in it.

segments.content: --where to plant the seed. That is
no illusion, Master.
Ah, yes. But no matter what you do,
that seed will grow to be a peach
tree. You may wish for an apple, or
an orange... but you will get a
peach.
But a peach cannot defeat Tai Lung!
Maybe it can. If you are willing to
guide it, to nurture it. To believe
in it.
Oogway covers the seed with dirt.
But how? How? I need your help,
Master.
No, you just need to believe.
Promise me, Shifu. Promise me you
will believe.
Oogway smiles, then glances up at the sky, then back down to Shifu.

dialogue.text: Oogway smiles, then glances up at the sky, then back down to Shifu.

segments.content: Good. My time has come. You must
continue your journey without me.
He hands his staff to a confused Shifu.
Oogway backs away into the swirling fog.

dialogue.text: Oogway backs away into the swirling fog.

segments.content: The petals surround Oogway as he approaches the cliff's edge.

dialogue.text: The petals surround Oogway as he approaches the cliff's edge.

segments.content: You must believe.
Master!
Shifu runs after him. Oogway is engulfed by peach blossoms.
As the winds settle, Shifu is revealed standing at the edge
of a cliff.
Oogway is gone.
We pan across to the bunkhouse.
...So I'm like, fine, you may be a
wolf, you may be the scariest
bandit in Haijin Province...

Reveal Po is cooking for the Five.   He chops some veggies mid-

          air.
...but you're a lousy tipper.
(incredulous)
Really? So... how'd you get out of
there alive?
I mean, I didn't actually say that,
but I thought it... in my mind.
Po flips some bowls and expertly lines them up on his arm. He
ladles soup into them.
(covering)
If he... could read my mind, he'd
have been like, "What?"
(then)
Po looks around expectantly and the Five (minus Tigress) dig in.

dialogue.text: Po looks around expectantly and the Five (minus Tigress) dig in.

segments.content: Hope you like it.
This is really good.
(bashful)
No, c'mon.
You should try my dad's secret
ingredient soup. He actually knows
the secret ingredient.
What are you talking about? This is
amazing.
Wow, you're a really good cook.
The others laugh. But not Tigress.

character.name: I wish my mouth was bigger.

dialogue.text: The others laugh. But not Tigress.

segments.content: Tigress looks up from her meal.

dialogue.text: Tigress looks up from her meal.

segments.content: It is said that the Dragon Warrior
can survive for months at a time on
nothing but the dew of a single
gingko leaf and the energy of the
universe.
On the others for a beat. Then Po shrugs.
I guess my body doesn't know it's
the Dragon Warrior yet. I'm gonna
need a lot more than dew. And, uh,
universe juice.
Po laughs. He picks up his bowl and takes a giant gulp. When
he lowers the bowl, we see a noodle hanging from his face --
it looks like a moustache. Mantis snickers.
What?
The rest start laughing. Po realizes he's wearing a noodle moustache. He plays it up.

dialogue.text: The rest start laughing. Po realizes he's wearing a noodle moustache. He plays it up.

segments.content: (imitating Shifu)
You will never be the Dragon
Warrior, unless you lose five
hundred pounds and brush your
teeth!
The Five LAUGH.
(imitating Shifu)
What is that noise you're making?
The Five keep LAUGHING. Po reaches over and grabs two empty bowls and holds them up like ears.

character.name: Laughter? I never heard of it!

dialogue.text: The Five keep LAUGHING. Po reaches over and grabs two empty bowls and holds them up like ears.

segments.content: (imitating Shifu)
Work hard, Panda. And maybe,
someday... you will have ears like
mine.
As the rest of the Five laugh, Tigress sneaks a moment to
smell Po's soup. Leaning towards the bowl, she suddenly looks
up and stops. The Five also look up and stop laughing.
Reveal Shifu has entered behind Po. He is holding Oogway's
staff.
(normal)
Ears. It's not working for you? I
thought they were pretty good.
Po looks at the stone-faced Five. Tigress jumps to her feet.
It's Shifu.
Of course it's Shifu. What do you
think I'm doing?
He finally notices Shifu standing there, doing a slow burn.
Embarrassed, he places the soup bowls on his chest like a
bra.
Po slurps up the noodle moustache. Monkey can't help but snicker.

dialogue.text: Po slurps up the noodle moustache. Monkey can't help but snicker.

segments.content: You think this is funny? Tai Lung
has escaped from prison and you're
acting like children!
What?
He is coming for the Dragon Scroll,
and you are the only one who can
stop him.
The bowls fall off. A beat as this sinks in... then Po starts
to laugh.
And here I am saying you got no
sense of humor. I'm gonna stop
Shifu just stares at him, deadly serious.

dialogue.text: Shifu just stares at him, deadly serious.

segments.content: What? You're serious? And I have to--
uh, Master Oogway will stop him! He
did it before, he'll do it again.
They notice Shifu holding Oogway's staff. They know what this means. They are saddened by the news.

dialogue.text: They notice Shifu holding Oogway's staff. They know what this means. They are saddened by the news.

segments.content: Our only hope is the Dragon
Warrior.
The panda?
Yes, the panda!
Master, please. Let us stop Tai
Lung. This is what you've trained
us for.
No! It is not your destiny to
defeat Tai Lung. It is his.
He dramatically points at Po... but Po is gone.
Shifu throws up his hands in frustration and heads after Po.

dialogue.text: Shifu throws up his hands in frustration and heads after Po.

heading.subject: r as
heading.raw_text: Super wide shot as Po runs away from the compound. Closer as

segments.content:
he continues running. He checks over his shoulder, turns

          back... Shifu lands right in front of him.
You cannot leave! A real warrior
never quits!
He tries to maneuver around Shifu, but is redirected back.

dialogue.text: He tries to maneuver around Shifu, but is redirected back.

segments.content: Come on! How am I supposed to beat
Tai Lung? I can't even beat you to
the stairs.
You will beat him because you are
the Dragon Warrior!
He pushes Po back with the staff.
Ow! You don't believe that! You
never believed that! From the first
moment I got here, you've been
trying to get rid of me.
Shifu pokes him again, this time causing Po to fall on his
back.
Yes. I was. But now I ask you to
trust in your master as I have come
to trust in mine.
You're not my master. And I'm not
the Dragon Warrior.
Po shoves the staff away and gets up.
Then why didn't you quit? You knew
I was trying to get rid of you, and
yet you stayed.
Yeah, I stayed. I stayed because
every time you threw a brick at my
head or said I smelled, it hurt.
But it could never hurt more than
it did every day of my life just
being me.
Po looks down at the Valley, then turns back to Shifu.
I stayed because I thought if
anyone could change me, could make
me... not me, it was you. The
greatest kung fu teacher in all of
China.
But I can change you! I can turn
you into the Dragon Warrior! And I
will!
C'mon, Tai Lung is on his way here
right now. And even if it takes him
a hundred years to get here, how
are you gonna change this...
(indicate belly)
...into the Dragon Warrior? How?
In frustration, Shifu yells out the answer.

dialogue.text: In frustration, Shifu yells out the answer.

segments.content: I don't know!!!
(then, resigned)
I don't know.
Shifu walks away, leaving the path open to Po. EXT. JADE PALACE - NIGHT Tigress stands in the moonlight outside the palace. She has seen what just transpired between Shifu and Po.

dialogue.text: Shifu walks away, leaving the path open to Po. EXT. JADE PALACE - NIGHT Tigress stands in the moonlight outside the palace. She has seen what just transpired between Shifu and Po.

segments.content: She turns away, a look of resolve on her face... and LEAPS.
She flies through the air, finally landing on a rooftop in
the valley below. She looks back up at the palace.
She takes off running. The other four are right behind her.

character.name: This is what you trained me for.

dialogue.text: She takes off running. The other four are right behind her.

segments.content: She keeps going and they give chase.

dialogue.text: She keeps going and they give chase.

segments.content: The chase continues through the village.

dialogue.text: The chase continues through the village.

segments.content: We're not trying to stop you!
What?

Then...the others join her. Tigress smiles. They leap off into the night. EXT. JADE PALACE - EVENING Night dissolves to dawn. Shifu sits under the peach tree. He stirs, hearing KUNG FU NOISES from the training hall. He goes to investigate.

dialogue.text: Then...the others join her. Tigress smiles. They leap off into the night. EXT. JADE PALACE - EVENING Night dissolves to dawn. Shifu sits under the peach tree. He stirs, hearing KUNG FU NOISES from the training hall. He goes to investigate.

segments.content:
Shifu looks inside -- it's empty. The NOISES continue from

          somewhere else -- the bunkhouse.

As Shifu turns the corner he sees Po's shadow as he performs

          some amazing Kung Fu.

          Entering the kitchen, Shifu finds Po is stuffing his face

          with food. Seeing Shifu, he stops mid-munch.

          In silence they eye each other. Shifu surveys the room --

          broken lock, smashed doors, unhinged cabinets. Po belches.
(mouth full)
Shifu gets a glimmer in his eye. He has an idea.

character.name: What? I eat when I'm upset, okay?

dialogue.text: Shifu gets a glimmer in his eye. He has an idea.

segments.content: Oh, no need to explain. I just
thought you might be Monkey -- he
hides his almond cookies on the top
shelf.
Shifu calmly exits and hides just outside the doorway,
waiting to see if his hunch is correct.
KLUMP! KLONK! THUNK! Shifu peeks back inside and finds Po
perched atop the high shelves jamming more cookies into his
mouth. Po notices Shifu walking back in.
(mouth full)
He glances back down at Shifu, whose disbelief turns to a wise smile.

dialogue.text: He glances back down at Shifu, whose disbelief turns to a wise smile.

segments.content: Look at you.
Yeah, I know. I disgust you.
No no, I mean... how did you get up
there?
I don't know. I guess I-- I don't
know. I was getting a cookie...
He looks at the cookie and then can't help but eat it.
And yet you are ten feet off the
ground and have done a perfect
split.
No, this... this is just an
accident.
He and Po stare at each other for a beat. Then... WHOOMP! Po
slips and crashes to the kitchen floor. A cookie rolls over
to Shifu. He picks it up.
There are no accidents. Come with
me.
Shifu leads Po through the mountains.
I know you're trying to be all
mystical and kung fu-y, but could
you at least tell me where we're
going?
Shifu just continues walking.

Shifu is sitting beneath a tree. Winded and wheezing, Po

          slowly works his way up the hill.

          Po sets his gear down and looks around. Shifu breathes in the

          morning mist as Po approaches.
You dragged me all the way out here
for a bath?!
Po begins to pat his armpits with water.
Panda, we do not wash our pits in
Po quickly stops. Realizing.

dialogue.text: Po quickly stops. Realizing.

segments.content: (in awe)
The pool of...
This is where Oogway unravelled the
mysteries of harmony and focus.

The camera cranes up to reveal they are standing on rock shapes that resemble a yin yang symbol. As the camera pulls further out, it pulls back through a vision of Oogway doing Kung Fu moves. FLASH FRAME -- Shifu leaps atop one of the rocks and looks down at Po.

character.name: This is the birthplace of Kung Fu.

dialogue.text: The camera cranes up to reveal they are standing on rock shapes that resemble a yin yang symbol. As the camera pulls further out, it pulls back through a vision of Oogway doing Kung Fu moves. FLASH FRAME -- Shifu leaps atop one of the rocks and looks down at Po.

segments.content: Do you want to learn Kung Fu?
(awestruck)
Yeah...
Then I am your master!
Tears of joy well up in Po's eyes.

dialogue.text: Tears of joy well up in Po's eyes.

segments.content: Don't cry.
Po sniffs the tears back and smiles. EXT. FIELD - LATER Shifu leads Po out into an open field.

dialogue.text: Po sniffs the tears back and smiles. EXT. FIELD - LATER Shifu leads Po out into an open field.

segments.content: When you focus on Kung Fu, when you
concentrate...you stink.
Po scowls.
But perhaps that is my fault. I
cannot train you the way I have
trained the Five. I now see that
the way to get through to you is
with this!
Shifu produces a bowl of dumplings.
Oh great, `cause I'm hungry.
Good. When you have been trained,
you may eat. Let us begin.

Po's training unfolds -- deep breathing exercises, balance

          tests, push ups, sit ups, climbing, etc. Through it all, he

          never gets to eat, although he does indeed learn kung fu.
Shifu sets a bowl of dumplings on a boulder.
Po stops short, suspicious.

dialogue.text: Po stops short, suspicious.

segments.content: Just like that? No situps? No ten
mile hike?
I vowed to train you... and you
have been trained. You are free to
eat.
Po grabs one of the dumplings in his chopsticks.
Po raises the dumpling to his mouth. WHOOSH! Shifu snatches the dumpling away and eats it himself.

dialogue.text: Po raises the dumpling to his mouth. WHOOSH! Shifu snatches the dumpling away and eats it himself.

segments.content: Hey!
I said you are free to eat. Have a
dumpling.
Po reaches again as Shifu leaps across the table and kicks
the dumpling into the air.
Shifu eats it and Po scowls.

dialogue.text: Shifu eats it and Po scowls.

segments.content: You are free to eat!
(upset)
Am I?
(challenging)

Po and Shifu ready their chopsticks. Po slams the table and sends the bowl of dumplings airborne. Back and forth, Po and Shifu spar, vying for the dumplings. Until there is only one left. Shifu tries every trick to keep the dumpling away from Po. He hides it underneath one of the bowls. He uses his chopsticks as weapons to smack Po's chopsticks away. He attacks Po with his bamboo staff. But Po skillfully manages to best Shifu for the final dumpling. Shifu smiles. Po has passed the final test. But then Po tosses the dumpling into Shifu's open hand.

dialogue.text: Po and Shifu ready their chopsticks. Po slams the table and sends the bowl of dumplings airborne. Back and forth, Po and Shifu spar, vying for the dumplings. Until there is only one left. Shifu tries every trick to keep the dumpling away from Po. He hides it underneath one of the bowls. He uses his chopsticks as weapons to smack Po's chopsticks away. He attacks Po with his bamboo staff. But Po skillfully manages to best Shifu for the final dumpling. Shifu smiles. Po has passed the final test. But then Po tosses the dumpling into Shifu's open hand.

segments.content: Master and pupil bow to each other.

dialogue.text: Master and pupil bow to each other.

segments.content:
The Five race toward a rope bridge stretched between mountain

          peaks.
Tai Lung appears at the other end of the bridge. He ROARS and
races toward them.

The others slash at the ropes securing the bridge to the mountain. Tai Lung is almost upon them when Tigress cuts the final rope. But Tai Lung is too close -- Tigress must launch herself into him. The two cats end up in the middle of the bridge just as it starts to tumble into the canyon below. The Five grab support ropes and hold on for dear life.

dialogue.text: The others slash at the ropes securing the bridge to the mountain. Tai Lung is almost upon them when Tigress cuts the final rope. But Tai Lung is too close -- Tigress must launch herself into him. The two cats end up in the middle of the bridge just as it starts to tumble into the canyon below. The Five grab support ropes and hold on for dear life.

segments.content: Where's the Dragon Warrior?
How do you know you're not looking
at her?
Tai Lung laughs. It echoes off the mountain walls.
You think I'm a fool? I know you're
not the Dragon Warrior. None of
you!
The Five exchange quick, worried looks.
(nodding confidently)
I heard how he fell out of the sky
on a ball of fire, that he's a
warrior unlike anything the world
has ever seen.
The Five exchange quick, confused looks.
Po?
So that is his name -- Po. Finally,
a worthy opponent. Our battle will
be legendary!
Tigress charges at him. The battle begins. Tigress punches
Tai Lung as he hangs from the bridge. But Tai Lung counters
with a maneuver that sends Tigress slamming backwards through
the bridge's wooden slats. Then Tigress gets choked by the
bridge's ropes. Monkey turns to Crane and Viper.
We've got this. Help her!
Viper grabs Tai Lung, which causes him to let go of the
ropes. Tigress plummets down into the gorge... but Crane
manages to catch her. Viper punches Tai Lung repeatedly with
his own fist. Tai Lung manages to get a paw around Viper's
"throat".
ANGLE ON MANTIS AND MONKEY. Mantis is straining to hold the rope by himself.

dialogue.text: ANGLE ON MANTIS AND MONKEY. Mantis is straining to hold the rope by himself.

segments.content: Go!
(then)
Monkey leaps into action, kicking Tai Lung in the chest and sending him crashing through the slats of the bridge. He gets back to his feet and starts running back to them on a single strand of rope.

dialogue.text: Monkey leaps into action, kicking Tai Lung in the chest and sending him crashing through the slats of the bridge. He gets back to his feet and starts running back to them on a single strand of rope.

segments.content: Mantis whips his end of the rope, sending a sine wave shooting toward Tai Lung. The rope whips Tai Lung in the face and he gets tangled up. The Five see their chance.

dialogue.text: Mantis whips his end of the rope, sending a sine wave shooting toward Tai Lung. The rope whips Tai Lung in the face and he gets tangled up. The Five see their chance.

segments.content: Working as a team, the Five kick Tai Lung's butt every which way. Tigress finally slashes the last rope holding up Tai Lung. He plummets down... down... disappearing into the mist. Mantis whips his end of the rope, returning his buddies safely to the mountain. The Five look relieved. But the relief is short-lived... Tigress notices that the other end of the bridge is circling the far mountain peak. Her eyes go wide with dread. The rope whips up. But Tai Lung isn't there. With a crash, he suddenly appears behind the Five.

dialogue.text: Working as a team, the Five kick Tai Lung's butt every which way. Tigress finally slashes the last rope holding up Tai Lung. He plummets down... down... disappearing into the mist. Mantis whips his end of the rope, returning his buddies safely to the mountain. The Five look relieved. But the relief is short-lived... Tigress notices that the other end of the bridge is circling the far mountain peak. Her eyes go wide with dread. The rope whips up. But Tai Lung isn't there. With a crash, he suddenly appears behind the Five.

segments.content: Tai Lung jabs a finger at Monkey, who instantly freezes.

dialogue.text: Tai Lung jabs a finger at Monkey, who instantly freezes.

segments.content: But he didn't teach you everything.
Tai lung lunges toward the rest.

Shifu and Po walk through the palace courtyard. Po has an

          easy spring in his step.
You have done well, Panda.
Done well? Done well?! I've done
awesome!
He swings his belly around and knocks Shifu off balance.
Shifu staggers back, regaining his dignity.
The mark of a true hero is
humility!
After a moment's thought, though, he leans toward Po -

And he punches him playfully on the arm. Po smiles at him. As they LAUGH, an indistinct figure appears in the clouds behind them. IT'S CRANE! Crane carries the five to the palace grounds, crashing in a heap.

dialogue.text: And he punches him playfully on the arm. Po smiles at him. As they LAUGH, an indistinct figure appears in the clouds behind them. IT'S CRANE! Crane carries the five to the palace grounds, crashing in a heap.

segments.content: Po throws his backpack aside and runs over to them.

dialogue.text: Po throws his backpack aside and runs over to them.

segments.content: They're dead? No, they're
breathing! They're asleep?! No,
their eyes are open.
Crane struggles to lift his head.
We were no match for his nerve
attack.
His head collapses to the ground.
He has gotten stronger.
Shifu starts freeing the Five. First Viper, then Mantis, then Monkey releases suddenly from his paralysis -

dialogue.text: Shifu starts freeing the Five. First Viper, then Mantis, then Monkey releases suddenly from his paralysis -

segments.content: He delivers a Kung Fu punch to Po's head and then slowly realizes where he is.

dialogue.text: He delivers a Kung Fu punch to Po's head and then slowly realizes where he is.

segments.content: Shifu kneels before Tigress and works to free her.

dialogue.text: Shifu kneels before Tigress and works to free her.

segments.content: I thought we could stop him.
He could have killed you.
Why didn't he?
So you could come back here and
strike fear into our hearts. But it
won't work!
Uh, it might, I mean, a little. I'm
pretty scared.
You can defeat him, panda.
Are you kidding? If they can't--
They're five masters. I'm just one
me.
But you will have the one thing
that no one else does.

CLOSE-UP of the Dragon Scroll. Po stares at Shifu - then

          looks up at the Scroll. Then back at Shifu -
You really believe I'm ready?

They look at each other. This is a big moment. Oogway's staff hangs in a rack surrounded by candles. As Po and The Five stand by, Shifu carries the staff over to the reflecting pool. Shifu bows his head, then, eyes still closed, he raises the staff up above his head. Po and the others watch, expectantly. The peach blossom petals rise in a flickering, spinning cloud up from the pool. The gentle tornado rises up around the ceiling carving that holds the Dragon Scroll. The petals loosen the scroll from the dragon's mouth and it falls. At the last second, Shifu reaches out with the staff to catch the scroll on the end of it. He turns to Po, holding it out.

dialogue.text: They look at each other. This is a big moment. Oogway's staff hangs in a rack surrounded by candles. As Po and The Five stand by, Shifu carries the staff over to the reflecting pool. Shifu bows his head, then, eyes still closed, he raises the staff up above his head. Po and the others watch, expectantly. The peach blossom petals rise in a flickering, spinning cloud up from the pool. The gentle tornado rises up around the ceiling carving that holds the Dragon Scroll. The petals loosen the scroll from the dragon's mouth and it falls. At the last second, Shifu reaches out with the staff to catch the scroll on the end of it. He turns to Po, holding it out.

segments.content: Behold. The Dragon Scroll... It is
yours.
Wait, what happens when I read it?
No one knows, but legend says you
will be able to hear a butterfly's
wing-beat.
Whoa! Really? That's cool.
Yes. And see light in the deepest
cave. You will feel the universe in
motion around you.
Wow! Can I punch through walls?
Can I do a quadruple back flip?
Will I have invisibility--
Focus. Focus.
Huh? Oh, yeah... yeah.
Read it, Po, and fulfill your
destiny. Read it and become... the
Dragon Warrior!
Po takes a deep breath. Then he grasps the tube and tries to pull the top off it. It doesn't budge. He strains at it.

dialogue.text: Po takes a deep breath. Then he grasps the tube and tries to pull the top off it. It doesn't budge. He strains at it.

segments.content: He strains again. He tries to bite it off...

dialogue.text: He strains again. He tries to bite it off...

segments.content: Shifu SIGHS and holds out his hand. Po passes him the tube. Shifu pops the end off effortlessly and passes it back to Po.

character.name: Come on baby. Come on now...

dialogue.text: Shifu SIGHS and holds out his hand. Po passes him the tube. Shifu pops the end off effortlessly and passes it back to Po.

segments.content: Thank you. I probably loosened it
up for you though... Okay, here
goes.
He glances at the Five. They look on in awe. Monkey gives him
the `thumbs up.' Po starts to unroll the scroll, the golden
light bathing his face. Across the scroll we see Shifu,
excited that he is witness to history...
On Po's face as he finishes opening the scroll.
Then -

Shifu looks concerned. The Five look concerned. Po looks

          utterly terrified.
It's blank!
What?
Here! Look!
Po tries to show Shifu the scroll. Shifu covers his eyes and
turns his head away.
But he can't help himself. He takes a peek. Then he GRABS if off Po. He turns it around, then upside down. He closes it and opens it again, astonished.

character.name: No! I am forbidden to look upon--

dialogue.text: But he can't help himself. He takes a peek. Then he GRABS if off Po. He turns it around, then upside down. He closes it and opens it again, astonished.

segments.content: Blank? I don't...I don't
understand.
Shifu turns away, contemplative. What can this mean?
Okay. So like, Oogway was just a
crazy old turtle after all?
Po sits heavily on the floor, dejected.

character.name: No. Oogway was wiser than us all.

dialogue.text: Po sits heavily on the floor, dejected.

segments.content: Oh, come on! Face it. He picked me
by accident. Of course I'm not the
The Five don't argue.

character.name: Dragon Warrior. Who am I kidding?

dialogue.text: The Five don't argue.

segments.content: But who will stop Tai Lung?
He'll destroy everything...and
everyone.
Shifu puts the scroll back in its container and seals it. He
looks oddly calm as he turns around.
No, evacuate the Valley. You must
protect the villagers from Tai
Lung's rage.
What about you master?
I will fight him.
What?
I can hold him off long enough for
everyone to escape.
But Shifu, he'll kill you.
Then I will finally have paid for
my mistake.
The Five and Po look devastated.
Listen to me, all of you. It is
time for you to continue your
journey without me. I am very proud
to have been your master.
Shifu salutes them and turns away. Po is heartbroken. Crane
steps forward and kindly puts a wing around Po, pulling away.
Po resists for a moment, then lets the Five lead him off.
The Five arrive at the base of the stairs.
Monkey picks up a small child.

character.name: We've got to get them out safely.

dialogue.text: Monkey picks up a small child.

segments.content: Come, little one. Let's find your
mama.
Viper, gather the southern farmers.
Mantis, the north. Crane, light the
way.
They split up and begin helping the villagers evacuate. Po is
left by himself.
He makes his way through the bustling town.
(skeptically)
Po approaches the Noodle Shop.

dialogue.text: Po approaches the Noodle Shop.

segments.content: Hey, Dad.
Seeing Po, Po's Dad hurries over and wraps his arms around his son. Po bends down to reciprocate the hug, as Po's dad pulls away, having fastened an apron around Po's waist.

dialogue.text: Seeing Po, Po's Dad hurries over and wraps his arms around his son. Po bends down to reciprocate the hug, as Po's dad pulls away, having fastened an apron around Po's waist.

segments.content: Good to have you back, son!
(listlessly)
Po's Dad goes back to packing things up.

dialogue.text: Po's Dad goes back to packing things up.

segments.content: Let's go Po. So, for our next shop,
it's time to face it -- the future
of noodles is dice-cut vegetables,
no longer slices.
Dad starts to walk off, unaware that Po isn't following.
Also, I was thinking, maybe this
time we'll have a kitchen you can
actually stand up in. Hmm? You like
that?
He turns and notices that Po hasn't moved. He walks to Po
sympathetically.
Po, I'm sorry things didn't work
out. It just... wasn't meant to be.
Po slumps against the cart.
Po, forget everything else. Your
destiny still awaits. We are noodle
folk -- broth runs deep through our
veins.
I don't know, Dad. Honestly,
sometimes I can't believe I'm
actually your son.
Dad is taken aback.
Po, I think it's time I told you
something I should have told you a
long time ago...
Dad pauses dramatically.

dialogue.text: Dad pauses dramatically.

segments.content: The secret ingredient of my secret
ingredient soup!
Po feigns excitement.
Oh.
C'mere! The secret ingredient is...
nothing!
Huh?
You heard me. Nothing. There is no
secret ingredient!
Wait wait...it's just plain old
noodle soup? You don't add some
kind of special sauce or something?
Don't have to. To make something
special, you just have to believe
it's special.
Po looks at his father with dawning realization. He picks up
the Scroll.
For a moment, Po stares at his reflection on the scroll, then
he smiles serenely. He gets it now.
Po turns back to look at the palace.

dialogue.text: Po turns back to look at the palace.

segments.content:
At the top of the stairs, Shifu looks upon the Valley,

          awaiting his fate. With a gust of wind, Tai Lung appears

          before him.
I have come home, Master.
This is no longer your home. And I
am no longer your master.
Yes. You have a new favorite. So
where is this...Po? Did I scare him
off?
This battle is between you and me.
So. That is how it's going to be?
They fight. At last. Tai Lung punches Shifu clean through the doors of the Jade Palace. Tai Lung enters.

character.name: That is how it must be.

dialogue.text: They fight. At last. Tai Lung punches Shifu clean through the doors of the Jade Palace. Tai Lung enters.

segments.content: I rotted in jail for twenty years
because of your weakness!
Obeying your master is not
weakness!
You knew I was the Dragon Warrior!
Dissolve to FLASHBACK.

dialogue.text: Dissolve to FLASHBACK.

segments.content: A young Tai Lung looks expectant. Oogway shakes his head.
But when Oogway said otherwise,
what did you do? What did you do?!
Tai Lung looks to Shifu who averts his eyes and the past
dissolves into the present.
Shifu takes a Kung Fu stance.
You were not meant to be the Dragon
Warrior! That was not my fault!

Enraged, Tai Lung knocks over the Kung Fu artifacts and

          throws them at Shifu.

heading.raw_text: WHO FILLED MY HEAD WITH DREAMS?!

heading.subject: WHO DROVE ME TO TRAIN UNTIL MY
heading.raw_text: WHO DROVE ME TO TRAIN UNTIL MY

heading.subject: BONES CRACKED?! WHO DENIED ME MY
heading.raw_text: BONES CRACKED?! WHO DENIED ME MY

segments.content: Shifu dodges each attack.
Tai Lung pulls Oogway's staff from the shrine.

character.name: It was never my decision to make!

dialogue.text: Tai Lung pulls Oogway's staff from the shrine.

segments.content: They fight. Tai Lung pins Shifu down with the staff.

dialogue.text: They fight. Tai Lung pins Shifu down with the staff.

segments.content: Give me the scroll!

They struggle for a beat until finally, the staff splinters into a hundred pieces. Shifu looks back at the pieces and a flutter of peach tree petals fly by. Caught off guard, Shifu gets kicked by Tai Lung into a column.

dialogue.text: They struggle for a beat until finally, the staff splinters into a hundred pieces. Shifu looks back at the pieces and a flutter of peach tree petals fly by. Caught off guard, Shifu gets kicked by Tai Lung into a column.

segments.content: Shifu climbs the column to the rafters. Tai Lung follows and
sends them both crashing through the roof.
Lightning flash.
Grappling in mid-air, Tai Lung gets his hands around Shifu's
throat as they crash back through the roof.
They kick apart. Shifu crashes to the floor and lands hard.
Tai Lung bounces off the wall and throws a lantern to the
floor. Flames go everywhere. Tai Lung's arms are aflame as he
charges at Shifu.
All I ever did, I did to make you
proud! Tell me how proud you are,
THOOM! A fiery punch sends Shifu skidding across the floor and crashing against the reflecting pool. The flames extinguish and Tai Lung extends his claws.

dialogue.text: THOOM! A fiery punch sends Shifu skidding across the floor and crashing against the reflecting pool. The flames extinguish and Tai Lung extends his claws.

segments.content: (weakly)
I have always been proud of you.
From the first moment, I've been
proud of you. And it was my pride
that blinded me. I loved you too
much to see what you were becoming.
What I was turning you into. I'm...
sorry.
Tai Lung stops in his tracks. Shifu waits. Tai Lung's
expression goes cold. He grabs Shifu by the throat.
I don't want your apology. I want
my scroll!
He holds Shifu up to the ceiling. Looking up, Tai Lung
bristles when he sees the scroll is missing.
Tai Lung slams Shifu to the floor.
(weakly)
Dragon Warrior has taken scroll
halfway across China by now. You
will never see that scroll, Tai
Lung. Never. Never...
Tai Lung is furious. He roars, ready to strike Shifu.
Suddenly...
Tai Lung turns around to find Po standing in the doorway.

dialogue.text: Tai Lung turns around to find Po standing in the doorway.

segments.content: (out of breath)
Tai Lung casts Shifu aside.

dialogue.text: Tai Lung casts Shifu aside.

segments.content: Who are you?
Buddy, I am the Dragon Warrior.
(exhales hard)
Huhhh...
You?! Him?!
(to Shifu)
He's a panda.
(back to Po)
You're a panda. What are you gonna
do, big guy? Sit on me?
Don't tempt me. Haha. No. I'm gonna
use this. You want it? Come and get
it.
Po shows him the Dragon Scroll.
From out of nowhere, Tai Lung appears and punches Po across
the room, grabbing the scroll knocked from Po's hands.

Po bounces off a nearby pillar and slams back into Tai Lung, sending him flying into a column. Po puts on a brave face and strikes a pose as Tai Lung recovers and charges. Po turns to run. Tai Lung quickly catches up and they both sail off the Palace steps. Po clings to the scroll as Tai Lung delivers a kick and sends him crashing onto the theater rooftops below.

dialogue.text: Po bounces off a nearby pillar and slams back into Tai Lung, sending him flying into a column. Po puts on a brave face and strikes a pose as Tai Lung recovers and charges. Po turns to run. Tai Lung quickly catches up and they both sail off the Palace steps. Po clings to the scroll as Tai Lung delivers a kick and sends him crashing onto the theater rooftops below.

segments.content: Po rolls down off a tree and uses the recoil to whip back and
smash Tai Lung. He briefly skids across the rooftop and comes
right back at Po.

Down the Theater steps, Po and Tai Lung grapple for the scroll. Po is oblivious to the effects of crashing down stairs and in slow motion, his voluminous butt presses down on Tai Lung's head. As they crash through the Gateway the scroll is knocked loose. Tai Lung goes for the scroll but Po snatches it away using a noodle lasso. The scroll flies towards him and bounces off his head. Tai Lung leaps for it, but Po grabs his tail and pulls him back down onto a cart which see-saws Po into the air. In mid-air, Po slurps the noodle. Up and over the rooftops, Po lands in a grove of bamboo trees and into a nearby wok shop. The scroll rolls to a stop in the street. As Tai Lung makes his move on the scroll, Po turns the array of overturned woks into a shell game, sliding the woks around to hide the scroll.

dialogue.text: Down the Theater steps, Po and Tai Lung grapple for the scroll. Po is oblivious to the effects of crashing down stairs and in slow motion, his voluminous butt presses down on Tai Lung's head. As they crash through the Gateway the scroll is knocked loose. Tai Lung goes for the scroll but Po snatches it away using a noodle lasso. The scroll flies towards him and bounces off his head. Tai Lung leaps for it, but Po grabs his tail and pulls him back down onto a cart which see-saws Po into the air. In mid-air, Po slurps the noodle. Up and over the rooftops, Po lands in a grove of bamboo trees and into a nearby wok shop. The scroll rolls to a stop in the street. As Tai Lung makes his move on the scroll, Po turns the array of overturned woks into a shell game, sliding the woks around to hide the scroll.

segments.content: Tai Lung knocks the woks away and exposes the scroll as Po uses his bamboo stilts to block Tai Lung. The leopard swipes out the stilts and brings Po down on top of him as the scroll rolls down the steps towards the river. Po gets thrown into a fireworks booth. As Tai Lung chases down the scroll, he turns back to see Po flying through the fireworks-filled sky. Po slams through Tai Lung and crashes into a rock wall. The scroll flies out of his hand and lands in the mouth of an ornamental rooftop dragon. He looks back at Tai Lung, who sees where the scroll has landed. Via the magic of cookie- vision, Po effortlessly scales the building. Tai Lung is shocked.

dialogue.text: Tai Lung knocks the woks away and exposes the scroll as Po uses his bamboo stilts to block Tai Lung. The leopard swipes out the stilts and brings Po down on top of him as the scroll rolls down the steps towards the river. Po gets thrown into a fireworks booth. As Tai Lung chases down the scroll, he turns back to see Po flying through the fireworks-filled sky. Po slams through Tai Lung and crashes into a rock wall. The scroll flies out of his hand and lands in the mouth of an ornamental rooftop dragon. He looks back at Tai Lung, who sees where the scroll has landed. Via the magic of cookie- vision, Po effortlessly scales the building. Tai Lung is shocked.

segments.content: The scroll has given him power.
(then)

He takes a giant leap and kicks the wall. The resulting

          shockwave collapses the building.
Amazingly, Po skips across the falling roof tiles to reach
the scroll in mid-air as Tai Lung leaps up behind him and
unleashes a punishing blow that sends Po smashing into the
ground. As Tai Lung lands, he delivers a final devastating
punch.
As the dust settles, Tai Lung is looming over Po in the
impact crater.
(out of breath)
Finally... oh yes... the power of
the Dragon Scroll... is mine!
Tai Lung grabs for the scroll and opens it. His face falls.
Po stirs.

dialogue.text: Po stirs.

segments.content: It's okay. I didn't get it the
first time either.
(disbelief)
Po gets to his feet.

dialogue.text: Po gets to his feet.

segments.content: There is no secret ingredient. It's
just you.
Tai Lung snarls and lunges at Po.
Tai Lung attacks Po's nerve points. But Po begins giggling.
Stop! Stop it! I'm gonna pee!
Tai Lung's nerve attack has no effect on Po. Frustrated, he delivers a double-fisted punch to Po's belly.

dialogue.text: Tai Lung's nerve attack has no effect on Po. Frustrated, he delivers a double-fisted punch to Po's belly.

segments.content: The shockwave ripples through Po's entire body and Po's arms
come back and strike Tai Lung, sending the leopard crashing
back into a building. Po looks at his hands, amazed at what
he just did.
Tai Lung rises from the rubble and runs at Po again. But Po
strikes back, using an unorthodox panda-style technique, even
getting Tai Lung to chomp down on his own tail. Po gives Tai
Lung a butt bump that sends him crashing into a building. Tai
Lung emerges and attempts one more lunge at Po. But Po
prepares... and Tai Lung is swiftly met by Po's IRON BELLY!
He is launched into the air. Po waits... and waits... until
finally, Tai Lung appears in the sky and crashes to the
ground.
Tai Lung is battered, but still defiant.
(heavy breathing)
You... can't defeat me. You're just
a big, fat panda!
SCHWING! Po grabs Tai Lung's finger. Tai Lung's eyes go wide.
I'm not a big, fat panda. I'm the
big, fat panda.
Po's pinky pops up. Tai Lung gasps.
The Wuxi Finger Hold!
Oh, you know this hold?
You're bluffing. You're bluffing!
Shifu didn't teach you that.
He flexes his pinky...

dialogue.text: He flexes his pinky...

segments.content: KA-THOOM!

dialogue.text: KA-THOOM!

segments.content:
A mushroom cloud appears over the Valley, sweeping past the

          Furious Five and the fleeing villagers.

heading.raw_text: EXT. VALLEY SQUARE - A LITTLE LATER

segments.content:
Villagers emerge from hiding. Po walks out from the mist

          looking very much like the warrior from the opening dream.
As he nears, we see that his hat is an upside down wok and his scarf is a torn apron. Villagers CHEER the Dragon Warrior. Po's Dad emerges from the crowd.

dialogue.text: As he nears, we see that his hat is an upside down wok and his scarf is a torn apron. Villagers CHEER the Dragon Warrior. Po's Dad emerges from the crowd.

segments.content: That's my boy. That big, lovely
kung fu warrior is my son!
Po hugs his dad. The wok falls off Po's head and rolls on the ground until Mantis appears in frame and stops it. The rest of the Five are with him. Po takes notice.

dialogue.text: Po hugs his dad. The wok falls off Po's head and rolls on the ground until Mantis appears in frame and stops it. The rest of the Five are with him. Po takes notice.

segments.content: Hey, guys.
Tigress bows deeply. The others follow.

dialogue.text: Tigress bows deeply. The others follow.

segments.content: Master.
(modest)
Master?
(then, remembering)
Po races toward the Jade Palace. He climbs the steps. Then more steps.

dialogue.text: Po races toward the Jade Palace. He climbs the steps. Then more steps.

segments.content:
Po arrives breathless at the Jade Palace. Shifu is still

          lying in the scroll room, his eyes closed. Po rushes to his

          side.
Shifu weakly opens his eyes.

character.name: Master! Shifu! Shifu! Are you okay?

dialogue.text: Shifu weakly opens his eyes.

segments.content: Po! You're alive!
(then, darkly)
Or we're both dead.
No, Master, I didn't die. I
defeated Tai Lung!
Shifu smiles and shakes his head in disbelief.

dialogue.text: Shifu smiles and shakes his head in disbelief.

segments.content: Wow. It is as Oogway foretold --
You are the Dragon Warrior. You
have brought peace to this Valley.
And to me. Thank you. Thank you,
Shifu closes his eyes. He is still. Po starts freaking out.

dialogue.text: Shifu closes his eyes. He is still. Po starts freaking out.

segments.content: No! Master! No No No! Don't die,
Shifu. Please...
(eyes snapping open)
I'm not dying, you idiot-- ah,
Dragon Warrior. I'm simply at
peace. Finally.
Oh. So, um, I should...stop
talking?
Po nods reverently as Shifu closes his eyes again. Master and pupil lie next to each other. The camera pulls up and back away from them. Po tries to remain still, but it's hard.

dialogue.text: Po nods reverently as Shifu closes his eyes again. Master and pupil lie next to each other. The camera pulls up and back away from them. Po tries to remain still, but it's hard.

segments.content: He's about to say something, but he stops himself. He fidgets
for a beat, then can't control himself any longer.
Want to get something to eat?
(sighs)
Yeah.
